post.author: 김세환
post.content:
Position Description

1. Computer Operator in UNISYS-2200 environment.

2.  Oparation and Mapper knowledge required.

3.  4PM - 12 AM shift, could be rotational.

4.  Mississauga area.

5.  $40,000 - $45,000 range.


If you are qualified and interested , send a Resume to

'saewhankim@hanmail.net'.


This Job information is supplied by 'W5 Resources'.
post.title: Wanted..Computer Operator..
